column1: Service Domain specification for ECM And DCM

column2: The service domain provides fulfillment services for the issuance of primary market equity and debt capital market instruments for corporate customers. It supports both private and public (IPO) placements and covers the specification, pricing and placement activities associated with issuance. (it does not include secondary market trading of the instrument)
A corporate customer raises capital through issuing corporate debt in the private capital markets
Supports the specification, pricing and issuance of equity and debt (bond) primary capital market products for corporate financing services
Determining and specifying the equity/debt instrument. Prospectus and pricing. Road show and placement
